hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo "giteePullRequestIid: ${giteePullRequestIid}" echo "giteeAfterCommitSha: ${giteeAfterCommitSha}" echo "giteeRef: ${giteeRef}" git config --global core.compression 0
openGaussYat_Http_Repo_Url="https://gitee.com/opengauss/Yat.git"
a=0 flag=0 while [ $a -lt 10 ] do echo $a rm -rf ${WORKSPACE}/Yat_upgrade timeout 60 git clone -b ${giteeTargetBranch} "${openGaussYat_Http_Repo_Url}" "${WORKSPACE}/Yat_upgrade" if [[ $? == 0 ]] ; then flag=1 break fi a=`expr $a + 1` done
if [[ $flag == 0 ]] ; then echo "clone code failed!" exit 1 fi
cd ${WORKSPACE}/Yat_upgrade git rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree git config remote.origin.url ${openGaussYat_Http_Repo_Url} git fetch --tags --force --progress origin ${giteeRef}:${giteeRef} git checkout -b ${giteeRef} ${giteeRef}
echo "start check yat upgrade"
#sh /home/OM/remote_clean.sh
#if [ -e /home/OM/ssh/known_hosts ] #then #rm -rf ~/.ssh/* #cp /home/OM/ssh/* ~/.ssh/ #fi
